alert.note: Alert for Morehouse (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 30 at 1:21PM CDT until March 30 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas... Northwestern Morehouse Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 121 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 8 miles northwest of Sterlington, or 15 miles west of Bastrop, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Beekman around 145 PM CDT. Berlin around 200 PM CDT. Parkdale around 210 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Bonita. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
